DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare clinical efficiency patient outcome use ultra low-dose stress Tc-99m solid-state SPECT versus traditional Anger SPECT .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Outcomes Stress-Only Anger D-SPECT Stress-Only SPECT MPI
DOC.criteria: BMI < 35 kg/m2 LVEF > 40 % Exercise stress Elective outpatients No know CAD ( > 50 % ) catheterization No history prior myocardial infarction LBBB Pacemaker Atrial Fibrillation Frequent PAC 's PVC 's Inability achieve least 6 minute
